Name: Toy - Frost Beam
Description:
After using the item, Normal Attack Button is replaced with Release ​​Frostbeam​​ Magic.
After release, an ​​Frostbeam​​ is fired straight ahead of the character, players hit will be inflicted with a frozen state. Click Exit Toy Button to restore the normal attack button.
